GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.15.22
GSD.description:
IB/hfi1: Fix AIP early init panic

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit a3dd4d2682f2a796121609e5f3bbeb1243198c53, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit d99dc602e2a55a99940ba9506a7126dfa54d54ea. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: IB/hfi1: Fix AIP early init panic
